rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall that complies with Vastu principles by aligning the entry door in an auspicious direction (usually east or north) and allows natural light to flow into the farmhouse.

A combined kitchen and living space designed with eco-friendly materials. It features energy-efficient appliances, large windows for ample natural light, and a ventilation system that promotes fresh air circulation in accordance with Vastu.
A comfortable servant's quarters located adjacent to the main area. It ensures easy access while maintaining privacy and adherence to local building norms.
A dedicated storage and utility room that houses eco-friendly cleaning supplies, gardening tools, and other necessities. Positioned for minimal disruption to the living spaces.

openings.description: A wide entrance door that allows maximum natural light and adheres to Vastu principles for auspicious entry.
Large south-facing windows that enhance ventilation and light in the kitchen and living area, in line with eco-friendly design principles.
An east-side balcony providing natural light and fresh air to the living space while supporting greenery.
